Description: Verify successful login with valid email and password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Click the login button to display the login form
3. Enter email as "user@example.com"
4. Enter password as "securepassword"
5. Click the login button
Expected Result: - User is redirected to the dashboard page

Description: Verify error message for empty email field
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Click the login button to display the login form
3. Enter password as "securepassword"
4. Click the login button
Expected Result: - Error message "Email is required" is displayed below the email field

Description: Verify error message for invalid email format
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Click the login button to display the login form
3. Enter email as "invalid-email"
4. Enter password as "securepassword"
5. Click the login button
Expected Result: - Error message "Please enter a valid email address" is displayed below the email field

Description: Verify error message for incorrect password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Click the login button to display the login form
3. Enter email as "user@example.com"
4. Enter password as "wrongpassword"
5. Click the login button
Expected Result: - Error message "Invalid email or password" is displayed below the login button

Description: Verify error message for empty password field
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Click the login button to display the login form
3. Enter email as "user@example.com"
4. Click the login button
Expected Result: - Error message "Password is required" is displayed below the password field
